_source.text: 24 Such optimism did Watson affect that on Thanksgiving Day he offered a prayer of gratitude: "I am sincerely thankful that the storm of political hatred is abating; that a Populist is now considered a shade better than a pickpocket; and that 'Tom Wat- son' is no longer regarded as a junior partner to the devil."

_source.text: 1) ATI is better at OpenGL than Nvidia 2) On a MACINTOSH with Tiger, extra VRAM is a very good thing for the future, considering how the Quartz 2D Extreme will work (utilizing the GPU for OS rendering, caching it in VRAM)

_source.text: Afaik XRender exposes only a part of OpenGL and hence it's slower, afaik Cairo tried to use XRender extensively as a back-end but then dropped it for several reasons, otoh recently the Cairo devs decided that going pure OpenGL is better and their preliminary benchmarks have proven that.
